text: Hi, I need to check the registration of a patient with ID 12345678 for April 12th, 2023.

output.name: QueryRegistration
output.description: This API queries the registration of a patient given patient ID.

date.description: The date of appointment. Format be like %Y-%m-%d

appointments.description: The dict where from appointment_id to a list like ["patient_name":xxx, "date":xxx, "doctor_name":xxx]

text: The patient with ID 12345678 has an appointment with Dr. Smith on April 12th, 2023.
